video.title: Serverless Functions Course - Create a Serverless API
video.description:
Serverless functions and computing allows you to build and run applications and services without thinking about servers. Learn how to implement your own serverless functions in this complete course.

✏️ Course developed by John Smilga. Check out his channel: https://www.youtube.com/channel/UCMZFwxv5l-XtKi693qMJptA

💻 Code (Starter) - https://github.com/john-smilga/serverless-functions-starter
💻 Code (Complete) - https://github.com/john-smilga/serverless-functions-complete-project

⭐️ Course Contents ⭐️
⌨️ (0:00:00)​ Intro 
⌨️ (0:01:17)​ Serverless Functions Info 
⌨️ (0:07:25)​ Services Info 
⌨️ (0:09:31)​ Front-End 
⌨️ (0:11:11)​ Requirements 
⌨️ (0:12:55)​ Text Editor 
⌨️ (0:13:54)​ Starter Project 
⌨️ (0:14:53)​ Install Starter 
⌨️ (0:17:21)​ Starter Overview 
⌨️ (0:32:12)​ First Function 
⌨️ (0:41:30)​ Function Syntax Overview 
⌨️ (0:51:36)​ Status Codes 
⌨️ (0:59:20)​ First Example 
⌨️ (1:11:44)​ Redirects And Auto Imports
⌨️ (1:22:43)​ Basic Api Intro
⌨️ (1:26:12)​ Basic API Function
⌨️ (1:32:00)​ Basic Api Front-End
⌨️ (1:44:34)​ Deploy Intro
⌨️ (1:45:46)​ Continuous Deployment
⌨️ (1:55:07)​ CORS Errors Fixed
⌨️ (2:01:49)​ Free Requests Info
⌨️ (2:03:40)​ Airtable Info
⌨️ (2:08:54)​ Airtable Signup
⌨️ (2:14:17)​ Setup Products
⌨️ (2:20:10)​ Airtable API
⌨️ (2:26:30)​ Fetch Products From Airtable
⌨️ (2:37:06)​ ENV VARS
⌨️ (2:42:10)​ Display Products
⌨️ (2:53:33)​ Single Product Function
⌨️ (3:08:48)​ Single Product Front-End
⌨️ (3:20:39)​ Combine In One Function
⌨️ (3:25:38)​ ENV VARS Netlify
⌨️ (3:30:03)​ React App Intro
⌨️ (3:33:16)​ Setup React Starter
⌨️ (3:37:43)​ Basic Example
⌨️ (3:48:11)​ Serverless Function
⌨️ (3:53:41)​ Airtable Products
⌨️ (4:00:51)​ Single Product - React Router
⌨️ (4:07:33)​ Single Product Page
⌨️ (4:17:04) Deploy React App

--

Learn to code for free and get a developer job: https://www.freecodecamp.org

Read hundreds of articles on programming: https://freecodecamp.org/news

topLevelComment.author: asoh yannick
topLevelComment.text: Thank you so much sir John Smilga. Your courses on You-tube are very helpful and pushful to many, many developers across the world especially those who are just starting out. I love your teaching and coding techniques  and I wish to become a great senior developer like you one day as I keep practicing on how to become a better dev. May God bless you and grant you more understanding to keep teaching and educating the global community of developers especially the fresh guys.❣❣❣❣❣❣👍👍👍👍👍👍👍

topLevelComment.author: Coding Nuggets
topLevelComment.text: I've just started getting into serverless and this video was a great addition to my learning. Thanks!

topLevelComment.author: Ernie A
topLevelComment.text: Are Netlify serverless functions essentially just AWS Lamdas?

replies.author: Bens
replies.text: Yes. If you look at the context parameter you can see "invoked function Arn", which shows in what region your lambda function is running on AWS servers.

topLevelComment.author: hilty
topLevelComment.text: Is there Serverless Functions for blogging? I mean, I write the posts in a wordpress like interface and then I can collect this data on a static page, including pagination and even search.

replies.author: Param Chauhan
replies.text: Try Jekyll. You can host the blog on GitHub pages. Since it's static, there's no server required. Blogs are written using markdown.

replies.author: hilty
replies.text: @odunlade oluwaseun But, if I need to have a server with wordpress installed, this is not serverless. :-)

replies.author: odunlade oluwaseun
replies.text: Yes,  there are tons of tutorials on that,  wordpress with  gasby/next js,  wordpress serve as api
